info_message.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
info_message.user_plan_is_expired: Your current plan has expired and your access is limited. Please get a new plan!
info_message.plan_feature_no_access: Your current plan does not allow you to access this feature.

success_message.basic: Your requested command was performed successfully!

error_message.empty_fields: You must fill all the fields!
error_message.empty_field: This field is required, you must fill it!
error_message.invalid_captcha: The captcha code is not valid!
error_message.file_upload: Something happened while uploading the image and we could not process it.
error_message.invalid_csrf_token: The action could not be finished because the protector has expired, please try again!
error_message.basic: We could not perform your requested command!
error_message.file_size_limit: Your uploaded file is too big, the maximum file size you are allowed to upload is %s MB.

user_activation.subject: Welcome {{NAME}}! - Activation email
user_activation.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

We are glad you joined us!

One more step and you are ready,

you just need to click the following link in order to join {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}

Activate your account

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_pending_email.subject: Confirm your email address change - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_pending_email.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

You have requested to change your email address from {{CURRENT_EMAIL}} to {{NEW_EMAIL}}.

Please click on the link below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm email address change

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_lost_password.subject: Reset your password - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_lost_password.body:
Hey {{NAME}},

This is your reset password link: Reset Password

If you did not request this, you can ignore it!

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_payment.subject: Payment received - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_payment.body:
Hey there,

This is a confirmation that your payment has been received by us.

Your account plan is now paid until {{PLAN_EXPIRATION_DATE}}!

You can also check all the payments you made, change your plan or cancel it.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

admin_new_user_notification.subject: New User Registered!
admin_new_user_notification.body:
Hey!

A new user just registered to the website!

Welcome %s with the %s email to your website!

admin_new_payment_notification.subject: New Payment via %s of %s %s!
admin_new_payment_notification.body:
Hey!

A user just paid %s %s to the website!

Here's to more earnings!

admin_new_domain_notification.subject: New Custom Domain is pending approval!
admin_new_domain_notification.body:
Hey!

A user's custom domain is now pending approval.

Custom domain: {{DOMAIN_HOST}}

View domain

plan_settings.additional_global_domains: Additional Global Domains
plan_settings.additional_global_domains_help: You get access to extra domains to use.
plan_settings.custom_url: Custom Back-half
plan_settings.custom_url_help: Instead of auto generated urls, like /a853we6, you get to choose your own
plan_settings.deep_links: Deep linking
plan_settings.deep_links_help: Provides the ability to enter deep links, like: steam://rungameid/id
plan_settings.no_ads: No Ads
plan_settings.no_ads_help: You won't see any ads on the platform and neither will ads be placed on your biolink pages
plan_settings.removable_branding: Removable branding
plan_settings.removable_branding_help: All the branding will be removed from your created Biolinks
plan_settings.custom_branding: Custom branding
plan_settings.custom_branding_help: Change and whitelabel the branding of your Biolinks
plan_settings.custom_colored_links: Custom colors
plan_settings.custom_colored_links_help: You can choose your own custom colors for links inside of the biolink pages
plan_settings.statistics: Indepth Statistics
plan_settings.statistics_help: You get access to more advanced statistics for all your links
plan_settings.custom_backgrounds: Custom Backgrounds
plan_settings.custom_backgrounds_help: You can add your own custom Biolink page backgrounds
plan_settings.verified: Verified Checkmark
plan_settings.verified_help: You will get the verified checkmark for all your biolink pages
plan_settings.temporary_url_is_enabled: Links scheduling & limiter
plan_settings.temporary_url_is_enabled_help: The ability to schedule links for when to go live & when to expire based on amount of clicks or date range.
plan_settings.seo: SEO Features
plan_settings.seo_help: Customize the meta tags for your biolink pages
plan_settings.utm: UTM Parameters
plan_settings.utm_help: Easily adjust the UTM parameters for all your links
plan_settings.socials: Social links
plan_settings.socials_help: Get access to add quick social links in the footer of your biolink page
plan_settings.fonts: Extra Fonts
plan_settings.fonts_help: Get access to multiple fonts to use for your biolink page
plan_settings.password: Password protection
plan_settings.password_help: Get access to password protect your links or biolink pages
plan_settings.sensitive_content: Sensitive content
plan_settings.sensitive_content_help: Get access to enable sensitive content warning on your links or biolink pages
plan_settings.leap_link: Leap link
plan_settings.leap_link_help: The ability to temporarily redirect a biolink page to a specific URL (useful when having promotions)
plan_settings.unlimited_domains_limit: Unlimited Custom Domains
plan_settings.api_is_enabled: API access
plan_settings.api_is_enabled_help: Get access to use the REST API.

pages.title: Pages
pages.subheader: Here you can find useful page resources depending on your needs.

plan.title: Plan
plan.subheader_new: Select the most convenient plan for you.
plan.subheader_renew: Select one plan to renew your subscription.
plan.subheader_upgrade: Select one plan to upgrade your subscription.

pay.title: Pay
pay.accept: By continuing with your order you confirm that you read, understand & agree to the %s and %s of the site.

free.free_already: Your already have the free plan activated!
free.other_plan_not_expired: Your current plan is not expired yet, you will get the free plan after it expires!

trial.trial_done: Your trial option was already used, you can't renew it anymore.

custom_plan.subheader: You are almost there, complete the following form and checkout.

custom_plan.billing_required: Please fill in the required billing details!

error_message.code_used: You have already used this discount code..
error_message.canceled_payment: It seems you've canceled the payment for some reason.
error_message.failed_payment: Something didn't work quite right, please try again if this persists contact the site admin.
error_message.offline_payment_proof_missing: You must upload a payment proof before submitting the payment order.

pay_thank_you.title: Thank you
pay_thank_you.plan_custom_start: Your payment went through and your new membership is activated!
pay_thank_you.plan_custom_will_start: Your payment was sent and your new membership will be activated!
pay_thank_you.plan_custom_pending: Your payment order was sent and your new membership will be activated if the proof will be accepted!

change_password.subheader: If you do not want to change your password, do not fill any of those fields below.

twofa.subheader: Use a mobile authentication app to get a verification code to enter every time you log in.
twofa.qr_help: Open the authentication app (ex: Authy, Google Authenticator) on your mobile device and scan the following QR Code with your camera.
twofa.secret_help: Try inserting the following secret code into your app if you can't scan the QR Code.
twofa.verify_help: To confirm that you setup your code properly, please enter the 6-digit token from your mobile app.

cancel.subheader:
By cancelling your subscription no further payments will be made.
You will still have access to your features that you paid for until the expiration date.

settings.url_help: Leave empty for a random generated one.
settings.schedule_help: Set an exact date when the link will work.
settings.title: Title

branding.name: Branding Name
branding.name_help: Leave empty to have the default site branding.

settings.seo_block_help: Block your biolink page from being indexed by search engines.
settings.seo_title_help: Completely change the page title to a custom one that you are setting here.
settings.seo_meta_description_help: Set a custom meta description for your biolink page to rank better in search engines.
settings.seo_image_help: Set a custom OpenGraph/Twitter Image for your biolink page to display a link preview.
settings.utm_campaign: The campaign will be automatically set for each link in particular based on the name of the link.
settings.password_help: Require users to enter a password before accessing the link.
settings.sensitive_content_help: Require users to confirm that they want to access your link and letting them know that the link might be sensitive.
settings.leap_link_help: Fully redirect all users that access the biolink page to this URL. Leave empty to disable the feature.
settings.clicks_limit_help: Only allow the link to work for a certain amount of clicks.
settings.expiration_url_help: Visitors will be redirected to this URL after the main link expires.
settings.targeting_type_country_code_help: Send visitors to different URLs based on their country location.
settings.targeting_type_device_type_help: Send visitors to different URLs based on their device that they are using.
settings.targeting_type_browser_language_help: Send visitors to different URLs based on their main browser language.
settings.targeting_type_rotation_help: Randomly & equally split the visits to multiple URLs. Helpful when running A/B tests for example.

statistics.no_data: There are no statistics available for this date range
statistics.no_data_help: Wait until you get some traffic and come back.
statistics.country_help: Discover the countries that your visitors are from.
statistics.city_help: Discover the cities that your visitors are from.
statistics.os_help: Discover the operating systems that your visitors are using.
statistics.browser_help: Discover the browsers that your visitors are using.
statistics.language_help: Discover the browser languages that your visitors are having.
statistics.device_help: Discover the devices that your visitors are using.
statistics.referrer_help: Discover where your traffic is coming from.
statistics.utms_help: Discover how your UTM marketing campaigns are performing.

password.title: Password protected
password.subheader: You must input the correct password to continue. Your password will be remembered for 30 days.

sensitive_content.title: Sensitive content
sensitive_content.subheader: This link may contain sensitive content which some viewers may find offensive or disturbing.

error_message.blacklisted_url: This custom url is not available for usage!
error_message.blacklisted_domain: This domain has been blacklisted, you can't use it!
error_message.blacklisted_location_url: This url has been blacklisted, you can't use it!
error_message.invalid_location_url: Your entered link has an invalid format! Maybe you're missing the https:// from the url?

index.title: Homepage
index.header: Do everything with just one link.
index.subheader: Create shortened URLs, unique biolink pages and get proper analytics of your visitors.

presentation1.subheader: Easily manage all your links with the use of Projects.

presentation2.subheader: Create your own & unique biolink page, a ton of easy to use settings and implementations.

presentation3.subheader: Yes! You can use our service as a shortener as well.

presentation4.subheader: Day by day analytics, referrers, countries, operating systems, languages and many more.

pricing.subheader: Choose and get your plan based on your needs.

error_message.no_bearer: The request is missing the Bearer Authentication header.
error_message.no_access: You do not have access to the API.
error_message.rate_limit: You reached the limit of requests in one minute, please wait.
error_message.not_found: The resource you are looking for does not exist.

api_documentation.title: API Documentation
api_documentation.subheader: This is the documentation for the available API endpoints, which are built around the REST architecture. All the API endpoints will return a JSON response with the standard HTTP response codes and need a Bearer Authentication via an API Key.

authentication.subheader: All the API endpoints require an API key sent by the Bearer Authentication method.

filters.page: The page number that you want results from. Defaults to 1.
filters.results_per_page: How many results you want per page. Allowed values are: %s. Defaults to %s.
filters.search_by: What field are you searching by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by: What field to order the results by. Allowed values are: %s.
filters.order_by_type: The ordering of the results. Allowed values are: ASC for ascending ordering, and DESC for descending ordering.

statistics.type: Type of data to be returned. Allowed values are: overview, referrer_host, referrer_path, country_code, city_name, os_name, browser_name, device_type, browser_language, utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign. Defaults to overview.
statistics.country_code: Parameter only available for the city_name type.
statistics.utm_source: Parameter only available for the utm_medium and utm_campaign type.
statistics.utm_medium: Parameter only available for the utm_campaign type.

notfound.title: Not found
notfound.subheader: The page you‚Äôre looking for was not found.

create_biolink_text_modal.subheader: Add a title and a description with the Text Block.

create_biolink_youtube_modal.subheader: Paste in your YouTube video URL and we will show it as a video on your profile.

create_biolink_twitch_modal.subheader: Paste in your Twitch URL and we will show it as a video on your profile.

create_biolink_vimeo_modal.subheader: Paste in your Vimeo URL and we will show it as a video on your profile.

create_biolink_soundcloud_modal.subheader: Paste in your Soundcloud URL and we will show it as a playable song on your profile.

create_biolink_applemusic_modal.subheader: Paste in your Apple Music URL and we will show it as a playable song on your profile.

create_biolink_tidal_modal.subheader: Paste in your Tidal Song URL and we will show it as a playable song on your profile.

create_biolink_anchor_modal.subheader: Paste in your Anchor FM Podcast URL and we will show it as a playable podcast on your profile.

create_biolink_twitter_tweet_modal.subheader: Paste in your Tweet URL and we will show it on your profile.

create_biolink_instagram_media_modal.subheader: Paste in your Instagram Post, Reel or IGTV URL and we will show it on your profile.

create_biolink_spotify_modal.subheader: Paste in your Spotify Song, Album, Show or Episode URL and we will show it as a player on your profile.

create_biolink_tiktok_modal.subheader: Paste in your TikTok Video URL and we will show it as a video on your profile.

create_biolink_mail_modal.subheader: Capture emails for Mailchimp or get the emails captured via Webhook.

input.show_agreement_help: Require the user to confirm his agreement by ticking a checkbox.
input.mailchimp_api_help: Leave empty to disable mailchimp integration. How to get these details: MailChimp Documentation
input.webhook_url_help: Where to send the caught email to. Leave empty to disable.

create_biolink_rss_feed_modal.subheader: Display a simple dynamic RSS Feed on your page.

create_biolink_custom_html_modal.subheader: Add any type of custom HTML to display exactly what you need to.

create_biolink_vcard_modal.subheader: Add a VCard download button to your profile.
